evidence.claim: Tx3 Services utilizes AWS for hosting and cloud services to ensure scalability and reliability.
The company follows HIPAA regulations for data protection and handling of health-related information.
Tx3 Services offers FHIR integration capabilities for EHR interoperability.
They support X12 transaction sets in their EDI solutions processing for healthcare billing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in health tech with clear use of X12 standards in API integration.
